reviewText: I am sure that Master Ted Gambordella is an excellent practitioner.  But this is not up to the standard of the other Kobudo video offered on Amazon.com.  Most of which I have purchased and studied.  I really wish I could get my money back.  This is a video of a teacher and his class of kids learning the tonfa without much editing.  There is not a traditional kata to be learned here if you are looking for that.  You will not have the tools to "Master the Tonfa" with this video
